title: The Sleepy History of Crayons (Premium)
description:
This is a preview episode. Get the full episode, and many more, ad free, on our supporter's feed: https://getsleepy.com/support.
The Sleepy History of CrayonsTonight, Tom traces the history of a famous colorful toy. 😴 
Sound design: crickets. 
About Get Sleepy Premium:
Help support the podcast, and get:

Monday and Wednesday night episodes (with zero ads)

We'll love you forever. ❤️

And thank you so, so much. 
Tom, and the team.
itunes:title: The Sleepy History of Crayons (Premium)

itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. Fall into pleasant and colorful dreams, as we trace the history of a beloved artistic creation.
